channel.title: Pokemon on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A daily Pokémon puzzle game is out now as part of a busy lineup
item.description: There’s a lot going on in the world of Pokémon — and you can play at least one of them right now. During its latest Pokémon Presents presentation, the Pokémon Company surprise launched Pokémon F

item.title: Razer’s new Pokémon collab is not very effective
item.description: Razer’s new Pokémon collaboration is a missed opportunity. The four PC gaming peripherals in this lineup are simply reskinned versions of products that already exist, and which cost $20 to $40 mo
